summary: Stops belethor from locking his general goods store too early.
descriptionHtml:
[u][b]Description:[/b][/u] Fixes the bug which locks Belethor's shop during business hours. (8am to 8pm).

EDIT:
[b]This fix was added in USKP[/b]. This mod would mostly be interesting for those who do not want the whole USKP. Thanks for the info Gabdude.
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19/?

[u][b]Installation:[/b][/u] Download and activate in NMM or download and active the esp file.
[u][b]Conflicts / Dependencies:[/b][/u] None.

[u][b]More Info:[/b][/u] The bug is commonly triggered by Belethor following you out of the shop because he was still talking to you while you left.
[b][u]Modding info:[/u] [/b]I Just checked the "unlock" check-box on Belethor's "SellGoods" AI package. Nothing else. So Belethor still opens/closes at the right times and behaves normally. So of coarse feel free to use this in mods etc.
author: Scrax
